00014  * Predefined filter: Average1_filter
00015  *  A single state averager

00017 
00018 /* Filter namespace */
00019 namespace Bayesian_filter
00020 {
00021 
00022 template <class Filter_base>
00023 class Average1_filter
00024 {
00025     Filter_base ksf;        // Kalman State Filter
00026     
00027     typedef typename Filter_base::Float Float;
00028     class Cpredict : public Linear_predict_model
00029     // Constant predict model
00030     {
00031     public:
00032         Cpredict(Float qq) : Linear_predict_model(1, 1)
00033         {
00034             Fx(0,0) = 1.;
00035             q[0] = qq;
00036             G(0,0) = 1.;
00037         }
00038     };
00039 
00040     class Cobserve : public Linear_correlated_observe_model
00041     // Constant observe model
00042     {
00043     public:
00044         Cobserve(Float ZZ) : Linear_correlated_observe_model(1,1)
00045         {
00046             Hx(0,0) = 1.;
00047             Z(0,0) = ZZ;
00048         }
00049     };
00050 
00051 public:
00052     Average1_filter (Float iQ, Float iZ, Float z);
00053     Average1_filter (Float iQ, Float iZ);
00054     Float observe (Float zz);
00055     operator Float () const
00056     /* Returns filtered estimate
00057      */
00058     {   if (!bInit)
00059             ksf.error (Logic_exception("Average1 not init"));
00060         return ksf.x[0];
00061     }
00062 
00063 private:
00064     Cpredict f;
00065     Cobserve h;
00066     
00067     bool bInit;
00068     FM::Vec z;
00069 };
00070 
00071 
00072 
00073 template <typename Filter_base>
00074 Average1_filter<Filter_base>::Average1_filter (Float iQ, Float iZ, Float zz) :
00075     ksf(1), f(iQ), h(iZ), z(1)
00076 /* Initialise noises and set sizes
00077  * include first observation zz */
00078 {
00079     bInit = false;
00080     
00081     observe (zz);
00082 }
00083 
00084 template <typename Filter_base>
00085 Average1_filter<Filter_base>::Average1_filter (Float iQ, Float iZ) :
00086     ksf(1), f(iQ), h(iZ), z(1)
00087 // Initialise noises and set sizes
00088 {
00089     bInit = false;
00090 }
00091 
00092 template <typename Filter_base>
00093 typename Average1_filter<Filter_base>::Float Average1_filter<Filter_base>::observe(Float zz)
00094 /* Observe z, first call set initial state to z
00095  * Returns filtered estimate
00096  */
00097 {
00098     z[0] = zz;
00099 
00100     if (!bInit) {
00101         ksf.init_kalman (z, h.Z);
00102         bInit = true;
00103     }
00104 
00105     ksf.predict(f);
00106     ksf.observe(h, z);
00107     ksf.update ();
00108 
00109     return ksf.x[0];
00110 }
